select seq_review.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_review(review_no, product_id, userid, review_title, review_content, grade) values (#{review_no}, #{product_id}, #{userid}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{grade})
mapper.update: update tbl_review set review_title = #{review_title}, review_content = #{review_content}, grade = #{grade}, review_updateDate = sysdate where review_no = #{review_no}
mapper.select: select count(review_no) from tbl_review where product_id = #{product_id}
